entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening then becoming north 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
